Articles.Content:
Hello everyone

I used K.Yeon's OPT mod a bit when it first came out but dropped it due to getting overloaded from to many mods, I've been trying to get back into it but I can't get my head around what's going on with it.

Could anyone explain the situation?

@JadeOfMaar has a set of patches which bring the parts more on line with stock.

AFAIK, @K.Yeon hasn't done any updates for a while

@Star-Eagle There was the original OPT mod... then the dev created new parts, and they were different enuff, or whatever, that they decided to "retire" all the originals.

Someone in the community, didnt think the old parts should just die... So OPT Legacy was born (containing all the old parts), as a seperate mod...
so now there were TWO, seperate OPT mods. Stali was the last maintainer of Legacy.

Then, when *both* packs needed updating, JadeOfMaar got involved, and now updates and maintains OPT Legacy, and OPT Reconfig (a seperate mod that has updates for both OPT Legacy, and OPT (loosely referred to as "OPT Main").

Soooo... Between these three mods, you can use OPT "Main" or OPT Legacy with/or without the other installed.
OPT Reconfig however is required, and NEEDS to be used with OPT Legacy...

It is optional, NOT required with OPT "Main", as IIRC, it does have some updates for that in it.

Hope this helps clear things up.

Edited July 23, 2020 by Stone Blue
Thanks both of you, that's cleared everything up for me.
